content: Implement server-side region change detection in care_cases#update
Fix duplicate modal turbo-frame issue - remove embedded modal frame to avoid z-index/stacking issues
Simplify class name handling in RegionUpdateFormModalComponent using .underscore instead of conditional
Remove HTML format handling from care_cases_controller if not actually used
Address the region update logic concern - make it more robust
Remove Stimulus controller file since it's no longer needed
